attributes.description: The value of the identity. This will often taken the form of a parseable string or a small structure of strings.
attributes.name: details

functions.meaning: Purpose of identity, e.g. legal ,  stagename,  nickname,  tribal name,  trading name. Taken from value of inherited `_name_` attribute.
functions.name: purpose

meta_info.description: An identity  owned  by a Party, such as a person name or company name, and which is used by the Party to identify itself. Actual structure is archetyped.
meta_info.name: PARTY_IDENTITY
